Question.Subject: whats a proxy that always works?
Question.Content: I work at a high school and my for me to get online I have to be their internet system and its a pain not to be able to check my e-mail, any good proxys to unblock yahoo, facebook, or myspace?
Question.ChosenAnswer: All proxies are created equal using the exact same technology. None is better than any other and the web filters know how to detect them now. So they don’t' work anymore.

Answer.Content:
Download and install Hotspot Shield: [http://download.cnet.com/hotspot-shield/, http://hotspotshield.com/], JonDo (with JonDoFox): [http://anonymous-proxy-servers.net/en/jondo/download/].
These software will mask your IP and assist you in bypassing any server frameworks. Hope this helps.
